page.title: 05GARDENERS WORLD
page.content: One day the BBC came to see my Grandpa Lindley they said they would like to make a television programme about his garden. The programme was called Gardeners World. My grandpa was very pleased he said it would be alright. When they stared filming my nanna went in a big van and watched it being recorded. The BBC people brought lots of cameras and lights. Before the programme was made my grandpa did a lot of work in the garden. The programme was on Friday 5th Sept the time was 8.35. We all went down to my nanna's to watch it on the television it was very exciting to see my grandpa talking and telling them about his garden.
